name: ADULT BLUE DRAGON
senses: Blindsight 60 ft., Darkvision 120 ft.; Passive Perception 22

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Shatter.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 10 ft. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 60 (11d10) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18): At Will: Detect Magic, Invisibility, Mage Hand, Shatter 1/Day Each: Scrying,

legendary_actions.name: Cloaked Flight
legendary_actions.text: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Invisibility on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Sonic Boom
legendary_actions.text: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast Shatter. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Swipe
legendary_actions.text: The dragon makes one Rend attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ancient blue dragons think beyond dominating groups of short-lived servants
